data.eml:eml: Checklist of eels of Taiwan (orders Anguilliformes and Saccopharyngiformes): An update

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Ho, Hsuan-Ching, Smith, David G., Tighe, Kenneth A., Hibino, Yusuke, Mccosker, John E. (2018): Checklist of eels of Taiwan (orders Anguilliformes and Saccopharyngiformes): An update. Zootaxa 4454 (1): 5-17, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4454.1.3
